text: Erik Mikhaylovich Galimov (; 29 July 1936 – 24 November 2020) was a Russian geochemist and Doctor of Sciences. He was born in Vladivostok, Soviet Union. He was Editor-in-Chief of the Russian journal Geochemistry from 2005 until his death. He was also academician of the Russian Academy of Sciences from 1994 until his death. He was a Distinguished Professor at the Lomonosov Moscow State University. Galimov died on 24 November 2020, aged 84.Умер академик Эрик Галимов, руководивший программами по изучению Луны ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian geologists Category:Russian chemists Category:People from Vladivostok Category:Moscow State University faculty
title: Erik M. Galimov
